entry.title: Jenkins agent service can not start automatically on Windows
entry.summary:
Whatâ€™s the issue

My Windows build machine is regular reboot after Windows updates, but my Jenkins agent service on this Windows can not
start automatically even I have set the startup type to Automatic.

Solution 1

After some research, select â€œAllow service to interact with desktopâ€ with service properties on Log On tab can fix this problem.

In service properties -> Log On -> Select â€œLocal System accountâ€ and select the checkbox for â€œAllow service to interact with desktopâ€.

Solution 2

entry.title: How to implement [skip ci] for Jenkins multi-branch pipeline
entry.summary: When I want to implement [skip ci] or [ci skip] for Jenkins multi-branch pipeline, the existing plugin seems broken.

entry.title: How to fix "Temporary Failure in name resolution" in WSL
entry.summary:
Problem

I have encountered a problem when I ping google.com failed and return some error like â€œTemporary failure in name resolutionâ€

How to fix

  1. Inside WSL2, create or append file: /etc/wsl.conf

  2. Put the following lines in the file in order to ensure the your DNS changes do not get blown away
